meanings.sent1: The nobiliary family lived in a grand castle.
meanings.sent2: The nobiliary title was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The nobiliary banquet was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her nobiliary grace and elegance shone through at the royal ball.
meanings.sent5: The nobiliary crest on the shield symbolized honor and tradition.

meanings.sent1: The nobiliary was respected by all in the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: She inherited the title of nobiliary after her father.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous nobiliary played a prank on the court jester.
meanings.sent4: The nobiliary stood tall like a mighty oak among the common folk.
meanings.sent5: The young nobiliary dreamed of one day becoming a wise ruler.
